# Setup

We'll use a range of R packages in this tutorial. Make sure you have them installed.

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(optimx)
library(terra)
library(tidyterra)
library(ggplot2)
library(sf)
library(rnaturalearth)
library(rnaturalearthdata)
library(cowplot)
library(ggspatial)
library(dplyr)
library(here)
```
